statements: UPDATE employee_survey_responses SET response_text = 'Good job!' WHERE response_id = '12345-67890-abcdef' AND employee_id = '98765-43210-fedcba';
UPDATE employee_survey_responses SET response_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE survey_id = '11111-22222-33333' AND response_id = '54321-09876-qwerty';
UPDATE employee_survey_responses SET response_text = 'Thank you for your feedback' WHERE response_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE employee_survey_responses SET response_date = '2022-09-30', response_text = 'Your input is valuable' WHERE employee_id = '987654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE employee_engagement_responses SET satisfaction_rating = 4 WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE inclusion_disparities SET notes = 'Addressed in the next team meeting' WHERE disparity_type = 'Gender Pay Gap';
UPDATE employee_engagement_responses SET satisfaction_rating = 4 WHERE employee_id = '62daf740-ef35-4aca-982f-4ef5418c2c70' AND survey_date = '2022-07-15';
UPDATE inclusion_disparities SET notes = 'Resolved the issue' , disparity_type = 'Pay Disparity' WHERE disparity_date = '2022-08-20' AND employee_id = '7689dd1c-8933-4e38-aa7f-65787542d02c';
UPDATE employee_survey_responses SET inclusion_score = 90 WHERE response_id = 101;
UPDATE employee_details SET department = 'Marketing', position = 'Manager' WHERE employee_id = 201;
UPDATE employee_survey_responses SET inclusion_score = 75 WHERE employee_id = 101 AND survey_date = '2022-05-10';
UPDATE employee_details SET department = 'Marketing', position = 'Senior Manager' WHERE employee_id = 201;
UPDATE employees SET department = 'Sales', position = 'Manager' WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE responses SET question3_response = 'Agree', question2_response = 'Disagree' WHERE employee_id = 202 AND survey_id = 1;
UPDATE employees SET age = 30, position = 'Manager' WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE responses SET question1_response = 'Agree', question2_response = 'Disagree', question3_response = 'Neutral' WHERE response_id = 201
UPDATE employee_details SET department = 'HR', position = 'Manager' WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE inclusion_score SET inclusion_rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Great work!', survey_date = '2023-03-15' WHERE employee_id = 201
UPDATE employee_details SET department = 'IT', position = 'Manager' WHERE employee_id = 101
